name: ImprovementInsights
functionalRequirements:
## Improvement Insights

### Purpose
Provide actionable recommendations based on analysis using the AIInsightsPanel component.

### Features
- AI-generated insights with markdown formatting
- Collapsible interface with copy/export functionality
- Priority recommendations
- Action items
- Success metrics
- Reusable AI insights display

dataRequirements.description: Provides actionable recommendations based on performance analysis

technicalDesign:
## Implementation

### Integration with AIInsightsPanel
Uses the AIInsightsPanel component for displaying insights with markdown formatting, copy/export functionality, and collapsible UI.

### Props
- insights: String content (markdown formatted) for AIInsightsPanel
- loading: Boolean state for insights generation
- error: Error message if insights generation fails
- onGenerate: Callback to generate/refresh insights
- metrics: Success metrics data

properties.description: Whether insights are currently being generated
